Title: Advance bravely along the road of socialism with Chinese characteristics
Designer: Peng Bin (彭彬)Zheng Hongliu (郑洪流)Xu Baozhong (许宝中)Cui Yong (崔勇)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: After the Chinese People's Movement of 1989 was violently crushed, large numbers of posters were published to propagate the restoration of 'peace and order', and the supremacy of the Party and the Army. This poster was clearly intended to create the impression that it was 'business as usual' in China.
